displayProperties.description:
A darkened instance of the Infinite Forest on Mercury, full of simulations that terrify even the Vex. Descend into its depths and see how far you can get before it disintegrates.

The Firewalled Haunted Forest has no matchmaking.
displayProperties.name: Firewalled Haunted Forest
